sentences.en: He’s through to the men’s tennis final for the first time.
sentences.cn: 他第一次打进男子网球决赛。

sentences.en: His voice will be edited out of the final film.
sentences.cn: 电影的最终版本会剪掉他的声音。

sentences.en: I poured two final fingers of bourbon into my glass.
sentences.cn: 我把最后两指宽的波旁威士忌都倒进自己杯中。

sentences.en: John's soldiers were readying themselves for the final assault.
sentences.cn: 约翰的手下正在为最后的进攻做准备。

sentences.en: Kenya's Robert Kibe was the fastest qualifier for the 800 metres final.
sentences.cn: 肯尼亚的罗伯特·基布是800米决赛入围者中速度最快的选手.

sentences.en: Stone is filming the final instalment of his Vietnam trilogy.
sentences.cn: 斯通正在拍摄越战三部曲的最后一部。

sentences.en: students preparing for their final examinations
sentences.cn: 正在准备期末考试的学生

sentences.en: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.--Winston Churchill
sentences.cn: 成功不是终点，失败也并非末日，最重要的是继续前进的勇气。

sentences.en: The city fathers have just given final approval to a new stadium.
sentences.cn: 市政官员刚刚决定同意建立一座新体育馆。

sentences.en: The editor's decision is final and shall evermore remain so.
sentences.cn: 编辑的决定是最终性的，而且应该永远不会改变。

sentences.en: The figures marked the final low point of the present economic cycle.
sentences.cn: 这些数据显示了目前经济周期的最低点。

sentences.en: The final episode will be shown tonight.
sentences.cn: 最后一集将于今晚播出。

sentences.en: The final stage of waxing left it with a satin sheen.
sentences.cn: 最后上完蜡后，它看起来犹如缎子般光滑亮泽。

sentences.en: the final stages in their relationship
sentences.cn: 他们之间关系的最后阶段

sentences.en: The final whistle (= blown at the end of a game ) was only seconds away when Redknapp equalised.
sentences.cn: 雷德克纳普将比分扳平的时候，离终场哨声吹响只剩几秒钟了。

sentences.en: The final word will still come from the Secretary of State.
sentences.cn: 最后仍然要由国务卿来定夺。

sentences.en: The judge’s decision is final.
sentences.cn: 这位法官的判决是最终判决。

sentences.en: The sides must battle again for a quarter-final place on December 16.
sentences.cn: 双方将在12月16日再次交锋以争夺进入四分之一决赛的席位。

sentences.en: The team has fought its way to the cup final.
sentences.cn: 这支队伍一路拼杀闯进了杯赛的决赛。

sentences.en: The winner of each preliminary goes through to the final.
sentences.cn: 每场初赛的获胜者进入决赛。

sentences.en: They scored in the final minutes of the game.
sentences.cn: 他们在比赛的最后几分钟得分。

sentences.en: This final part of the mixing is done slowly and delicately.
sentences.cn: 调和的最后一步要缓慢而精心。

sentences.en: We can advise the client, but in the end it is he who has the final say.
sentences.cn: 我们可以提出建议，但是最终的决定权还是在客户自己手里。

sentences.en: We examine the wording in detail before deciding on the final text.
sentences.cn: 我们彻底仔细地检查了措词后才最终定稿。

words.tran_cn: 结局；终曲；最后一场；最后乐章；尾声
定局；终结；结尾；最后的事物；最后的言行
决赛；期末考试；当日报纸的末版

phrases.tran_cn: 验收；最终验收；最后验收
最终报告；总结报告；决算报告

trans.tran_cn: 最后的，末了的，不可更改的
trans.tran_en: last in a series of actions, events, parts of a story etc

trans.tran_cn: 决赛，大学毕业考试，期终考试
trans.tran_en: the last and most important game, race, or set of games in a competition
